title: Falling for Her Wounded Hero
description: A debt repaid…with love?Tom Blake helped Tasha Raymond through a heartbreaking loss eighteen months ago—so when she learns he's been devastatingly injured she's determined to repay the debt by helping him in return.Working with the handsome GP stirs up a storm of emotions, but Tasha has no intention of truly getting close. The playboy's devil-may-care attitude is the last thing she needs! But then the wounded doc's kindness proves too much temptation for her heart to resist…
author: Marion Lennox
